description: I am running OpenStack Kilo on CentOS7.1.I want to launch a vm with two port,and each port can communicate with different standard vswitch,then the vm can be access to the outside with two physical cards.But now my environment can only be accessed through a standard vswitch.Current OpenStack release can support?
title: A question about compute node docking VMware virtualization platform

comments.content: I am running OpenStack Kilo on CentOS7.1.I want to launch a vm with two port,and each port can communicate with different standard vswitch,then the vm can be access to the outside with two physical cards.But now my environment can only be accessed through a standard vswitch.Current OpenStack release can support?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maoshuai

comments.content:
Hi  maoshuai
thank you for your question.

There is site https://ask.openstack.org/en/questions/. It can be helpful.

If you would like to report bug, you need to provide more detailed information:
- steps to reproduce
- logs (on debug level)
- environment details ( network design, configuration)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~anton-haldin

comments.content: Support requests won't get handled here. The mailing list (<email address hidden>) or the ask.openstack.org forum are better places.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
